title: ubuntu 8.04 Hacked Heron
description:
###################################################
##########Ubuntu 8.04 "Hacked Heron"###############
###################################################
based on: Ubuntu 8.04 LTS Desktop Edition - Supported to 2011
--------------------------------------------------------------
See the new features of ubuntu 8.04 at http://www.ubuntu.com/products/whatisubuntu/804features/
---------------------------------------------------------
Stuff added:
phun
aMSN
ubuntu-calendar
ubuntu-restricted-extras (java, some codecs, support for DVD-video, MP3...)
winRAR
ubuntu tweak
wine
wine-doors
skype
adobe reader
Opera
VLC
Mplayer
padevchooser (the GUI for PulseAudio)
ubuntu colors (theme for programs that run under wine)
virtualbox-ose-guest-utils (so the iso can run faster on VirtualBox)
amule
azureus
amarok
thunderbird
remastersys
(I think this is the correct list... can't remember if it's 100% accurate...)
-----------------------------------
Also included:
-Wallpapers
-ebooks
-utils
-----------------------------
md5 of the ISO: 568c7a367ec3679723e77001f8f56311
Size of the ISO: 926.654.464 bytes
-------------------------------------------------
(made with remastersys using the "backup" option)
----------------------------------------
Advice: You should not trust torrents that are not from the official website (www.ubuntu.com), if you want this, grab the books and wallpapers and give the Live CD a try, but then download ubuntu and make your own customized CD or DVD.
--------
More info inside!
